author: Pia Catton
title: New York Dance Venue Tries Pay-What-You-Want Model for Tickets
text:
It’s a version of “pass the hat,” but there’s more than a beer run at stake.
On Saturday, the Joyce Theater debuted “Pay What You Decide,” a ticket-sales initiative that allows guests to reserve a seat for $1 and then pay what they choose after watching a full dance performance.
Normally, as at most theaters, customers pay in advance at the...
